dataSet.name: AccountBalances

parameter.dcsat:name: Indent
parameter.dcsat:expression: CASE WHEN SystemFields.LevelInGroup = 1 THEN "" WHEN SystemFields.LevelInGroup = 2 THEN " " WHEN SystemFields.LevelInGroup = 3 THEN " " ELSE " " END

parameter.dcsat:name: Account
parameter.dcsat:expression: CASE WHEN Account.Code = "ZZZZZZZZZZ" THEN "" ELSE Account.Code END

parameter.dcsat:name: AccountPresentation
parameter.dcsat:expression: CASE WHEN (Account IS NULL) THEN "Retained Earnings" ELSE " " + Account.Description END

parameter.dcsat:name: AmountRCBalance
parameter.dcsat:expression: CASE WHEN (Account IS NULL) OR (Account.RetainedEarnings) THEN (-ISNULL(RetainedEarningsYearClosingBalance, 0)) + (-ISNULL(RetainedEarningsClosingBalance, 0)) ELSE -AmountRCBalance END

parameter.dcsat:name: Indent
parameter.dcsat:expression: CASE WHEN SystemFields.LevelInGroup = 1 THEN "" WHEN SystemFields.LevelInGroup = 2 THEN " " WHEN SystemFields.LevelInGroup = 3 THEN " " ELSE " " END

parameter.dcsat:name: Indent
parameter.dcsat:expression: CASE WHEN SystemFields.LevelInGroup = 1 THEN "" WHEN SystemFields.LevelInGroup = 2 THEN " " WHEN SystemFields.LevelInGroup = 3 THEN " " ELSE " " END

parameter.dcsat:name: Account
parameter.dcsat:expression: CASE WHEN Account.Code = "ZZZZZZZZZZ" THEN "" ELSE Account.Code END

parameter.dcsat:name: AccountPresentation
parameter.dcsat:expression: CASE WHEN (Account IS NULL) THEN "Retained Earnings" ELSE " " + Account.Description END

parameter.dcsat:name: Indent
parameter.dcsat:expression: CASE WHEN SystemFields.LevelInGroup = 1 THEN "" WHEN SystemFields.LevelInGroup = 2 THEN " " WHEN SystemFields.LevelInGroup = 3 THEN " " ELSE " " END

parameter.dcsat:name: AmountRCBalance
parameter.dcsat:expression: CASE WHEN (Account IS NULL) OR (Account.RetainedEarnings) THEN (-ISNULL(RetainedEarningsYearClosingBalance, 0)) + (-ISNULL(RetainedEarningsClosingBalance, 0)) ELSE -AmountRCBalance END

parameter.dcsat:name: Indent
parameter.dcsat:expression: CASE WHEN SystemFields.LevelInGroup = 1 THEN "" WHEN SystemFields.LevelInGroup = 2 THEN " " WHEN SystemFields.LevelInGroup = 3 THEN " " ELSE " " END

parameter.dcsat:name: CurrentDate
parameter.dcsat:expression: Format(CurrentDate(), "DF='dddd, MMM d, yyyy h:mm:ss tt'")
